Reference

Model Training

Train machine learning models

machine_learn()

Machine Learn

tune_models()

Identify the best performing model by tuning hyperparameters via cross-validation

flash_models()

Train models without tuning for performance

plot(<model_list>)

Plot performance of models

Make predictions

predict(<model_list>)

Make predictions using the best-performing model from tuning

plot(<hcai_predicted_df>)

Plot model predictions vs observed outcomes

Data Preparation

prep_data()

Prepare data for machine learning

pivot()

Pivot from a long data frame to a wide data frame

split_train_test()

Split data into training and test data frames

Data Profiling

missingness()

Percent of entries in each column that are missing

Connect to Databases

build_connection_string()

Build a connection string for use with MSSQL and dbConnect

db_read()

Read from a SQL Server database table
